line.comment: * Update purpose: if ongoing or terraformed, we don't reset it.
* RngAgain:
* Herobetty 5.3: First version of terraforming overhaul:
* 1. Removed weak re-roll. Changed super reroll.
* 2. Removed reputation, hacking (called "healing"), favor, maintenance, and perk effects.
* 3. Set amounts of population, support, and research to compensate.
* 4. Placeholder until possibly allowing the player to choose: commented out lines 28 and 36-38; reuse this for non-duplicate choices. (May not be needed because of the modest selection of options.)
* 5. Cleaned up the code by removing old effects.

* 6. Rarity system. Now have common (89% chance to draw from the common pool), rare (10% chance to draw from the rare pool), and epic (1% chance). Add-Ons 1.2: Added epic (old epic is now rare) effects to the pool.
* do if find $rng in array: $previousRngs
* goto label RngAgain:
* append $rng to array $previousRngs
* ****** TERRAFORMING EFFECTS ********
* Herobetty 5.1: Common tier.
* Herobetty 5.1: Population now gives a fixed +20 pops.
* $rng = random value between 2 and 4
* $rng = $rng * 10
* $effect[1] = $rng
* Herobetty 5.1: Support now gives a fixed +2 support.
* $rng = random value between 3 and 4
* $effect[1] = $rng
* Herobetty 5.1: Research now gives a fixed +30% research rate.
* $rng = random value between 3 and 5
* $rng = $rng * 10
* $effect[1] = $rng
* Herobetty 5.1: Removed hacking. Replaced with increased Ecells.
* Herobetty 5.1: Extra food.
* Herobetty 5.1: Removed favor. Replaced with increased waste.
* Herobetty 5.1: Split Ecells, food, waste, and tax into separate RNG categories. This category is now solely for tax.
* Herobetty 5.1: Removed maintenance. Replaced with increased population growth rate.
* +5 pop growth rate
* Herobetty 5.1: Removed EMP cooldown. Replaced with specialization.
* Specialization perk reduced from +5% to +3% (+5% now belongs to epic tier). See Mayhem.GetMaxSpecializationLevel.xml for the change.
* Herobetty 5.1: Rare tier
* Herobetty 5.1: +30 pops and 60% of the standard growth rate perk (+3 pop growth rate instead of +5 pop growth rate).
* Herobetty 5.1: +4 station support
* Herobetty 5.1: +60% research rate
* Herobetty 5.1: +100% repair rate at outpost and +2 station support.
* Herobetty 5.1: All 4 economy perks in 1: tax, waste, food, and tax but +50% each instead of +100%.
* +5% max specialization. See Mayhem.GetMaxSpecializationLevel.xml for the change.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Epic tier
* +5 stat points to all newly recruited marines.
* 10% more recycling factor (stacks with capital shipyard) and 20% more research gained from recycling.
* +40 Teladianium per minute. Goods are given once every Outpost consumption cycle.
* +25 Rastar Oil per minute. Goods are given once every Outpost consumption cycle.
* +60 Ore per minute. Goods are given once every Outpost consumption cycle.
* +60 Silicon per minute. Goods are given once every Outpost consumption cycle.

sval.val: Update purpose: if ongoing or terraformed, we don't reset it.
Herobetty 5.3: First version of terraforming overhaul:
1. Removed weak re-roll. Changed super reroll.
2. Removed reputation, hacking (called "healing"), favor, maintenance, and perk effects.
3. Set amounts of population, support, and research to compensate.
4. Placeholder until possibly allowing the player to choose: commented out lines 28 and 36-38; reuse this for non-duplicate choices. (May not be needed because of the modest selection of options.)
5. Cleaned up the code by removing old effects.

6. Rarity system. Now have common (89% chance to draw from the common pool), rare (10% chance to draw from the rare pool), and epic (1% chance). Add-Ons 1.2: Added epic (old epic is now rare) effects to the pool.
do if find $rng in array: $previousRngs
goto label RngAgain:
append $rng to array $previousRngs
****** TERRAFORMING EFFECTS ********
Herobetty 5.1: Common tier.
Herobetty 5.1: Population now gives a fixed +20 pops.
$rng = random value between 2 and 4
$rng = $rng * 10
$effect[1] = $rng
Herobetty 5.1: Support now gives a fixed +2 support.
$rng = random value between 3 and 4
$effect[1] = $rng
Herobetty 5.1: Research now gives a fixed +30% research rate.
$rng = random value between 3 and 5
$rng = $rng * 10
$effect[1] = $rng
Herobetty 5.1: Removed hacking. Replaced with increased Ecells.
Herobetty 5.1: Extra food.
Herobetty 5.1: Removed favor. Replaced with increased waste.
Herobetty 5.1: Split Ecells, food, waste, and tax into separate RNG categories. This category is now solely for tax.
Herobetty 5.1: Removed maintenance. Replaced with increased population growth rate.
+5 pop growth rate
Herobetty 5.1: Removed EMP cooldown. Replaced with specialization.
Specialization perk reduced from +5% to +3% (+5% now belongs to epic tier). See Mayhem.GetMaxSpecializationLevel.xml for the change.
Herobetty 5.1: Rare tier
Herobetty 5.1: +30 pops and 60% of the standard growth rate perk (+3 pop growth rate instead of +5 pop growth rate).
Herobetty 5.1: +4 station support
Herobetty 5.1: +60% research rate
Herobetty 5.1: +100% repair rate at outpost and +2 station support.
Herobetty 5.1: All 4 economy perks in 1: tax, waste, food, and tax but +50% each instead of +100%.
+5% max specialization. See Mayhem.GetMaxSpecializationLevel.xml for the change.
Add-Ons 1.2: Epic tier
+5 stat points to all newly recruited marines.
10% more recycling factor (stacks with capital shipyard) and 20% more research gained from recycling.
+40 Teladianium per minute. Goods are given once every Outpost consumption cycle.
+25 Rastar Oil per minute. Goods are given once every Outpost consumption cycle.
+60 Ore per minute. Goods are given once every Outpost consumption cycle.
+60 Silicon per minute. Goods are given once every Outpost consumption cycle.
